projects.name: Dice Chess
projects.description: Innovated a real-time desktop application with intuitive UI for the traditional game of Chess using PyGame library. Added twist to the traditional rules by introducing randomness based on dice-roll(6 faces of dice to 6 pieces of chess) for choosing the pieces to be moved. Implemented move validation for all pieces and incorporated play-with-computer feature based on Minimax algorithm with a depth of 3.

projects.name: SneakPeak - Ecommerce Website
projects.description: Developed a sneaker e-commerce site featuring secure user authentication, dynamic shopping cart, and user friendly interface. Integrated secure user authentication and role-based authorization using JWT, allowing users to sign up, log in, and manage their accounts. Built RESTful APIs for product management and order processing.

projects.name: Online Class Automation
projects.description: Automated Class Attendance: Implemented an automation script to join online classes on time ensuring consistent class participation. Scheduled Task Execution: Utilized Windows Task Scheduler to run the script daily at specific times. Web Scraping and Interaction: Leveraged Selenium to interact with the college portal, including handling login and navigating to class options.

projects.name: MLH Unofficial API
projects.description: Web Crawler: Crawls the MLH Website weekly to save hackathon details in MongoDB Atlas Database. API: Gives details of past and upcoming MLH Hackathons. Worked on merging it with discord bot.

experiences.description: Worked with FireTv team to implement Model-View-ViewModel design into settings package. Enhanced the performance of MVVM modules by 64 percent, optimizing react hooks. Explored architectural best practices and gained practical experience in react-native development, unit testing with Jest, and using git as the version control system.
